data.eml:eml: Redescription of Takahashia citricola Kuwana, 1909, and its transfer to the genus Pulvinaria Targioni Tozzetti (Coccoidea, Coccidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tanaka, Hirotaka (2012): Redescription of Takahashia citricola Kuwana, 1909, and its transfer to the genus Pulvinaria Targioni Tozzetti (Coccoidea, Coccidae). ZooKeys 217: 1-10, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.217.3405, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.217.3405
